entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy early this afternoon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
